column5: I have a radio with a chrome case that is scuffed up. I don't know if it is possible to bring it back to it's original mirror shine. I'm wondering is it's even possible. What would I need and how would I go about polishing it. Hopefully someone here would be able to help me out.  Thanks, Daniel
Geeez and here I thought you were having problems with chrome(stealhead)..Can't help with with your chrome case
Here's some links.   Removing Scratches in Chrome Metal  Removing Scratches in Chrome Plastic
Thanks for the reply,that's what I was looking for. Should have mentioned NS (non steelhead)LOL.
